title: Vest
description: dark blue coarse linen with red and blue tape edging front, back and vents; silk (?) cording on side seams, top of vents, and top of shoulders in red; geometric cross stitch embroiderey on lower front panels; more elaborate similar embroidery across lower back and two squares of embroidery on mid back; red, yellow, white and taupe; five sets of red frog closures on front edges; coarse dark blue linen lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
